Server API¶

Defines a class for running the server.

class ci_server.server.CIServer(address, port)¶

Runs server and supplies helper functions for the server handler.

__init__(address, port)¶

Initiates server variables.

Parameters

  • address – the address that the server runs on.

  • port – the port that the server runs on.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

make_log(lint_output, pytest_output, commit_id)¶

Logs output of tests and lint in a build log file.

Parameters

  • lint_output – string containing lint results.

  • pytest_output – string containing PyTest results.

make_log_title()¶

Generates a unique title for a build log file.

Returns

title of a build log file

run()¶

Runs the server.

update_commit_status(url, sha, status, TOKEN)¶

Updates the commit status of a given commit.

Parameters

  • url – github url to the status of a commit in a repo

  • sha – identifier of commit

  • status – status to assign to the commit
